articles.title: National Meeting of Personnel in Field of Posts and Telecommunications Held
articles.content:
National Meeting of Personnel in Field of Posts and Telecommunications Held
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- There took place a national meeting of personnel in the field of posts and telecommunications at the April 25 House of Culture on Monday.
					 Present at the meeting were Pak Pong Ju, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), officials of party and armed forces organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, party and power organs of provinces, cities and counties, exemplary personnel in posts and telecommunications service and officials of relevant units.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's historic letter "On Bringing About Fresh Turn in Posts and Telecommunications" was delivered by Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK, to the participants in the meeting.
					
					 The letter said that Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il advanced Juche-oriented idea and theory concerning the posts and telecommunications service, indicated orientation and ways of modernizing it as required by the developing revolution and devoted themselves to its modernization.
					
					 The letter also clarified tasks and ways for the personnel in the posts and telecommunications service to preserve and glorify the immortal exploits of the Generalissimos for the development of Juche-oriented posts and telecommunications and put the service on the world's advanced level as early as possible by devotedly carrying out the WPK's policy on posts and telecommunications.
					
					 The letter called on all the participants to bring about a fresh turn in the service by successfully discharging their honorable duties and missions in the spirit of devotedly serving the country and people.
					
					 Vice-premier Jon Sung Hun made a report.
					
					 He referred to the remarkable development made by the service thanks to the patriotic devotion and energetic leadership provided by the Generalissimos.
					
					 Their idea and leadership over the field of posts and telecommunications are being carried forward by Kim Jong Un, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The posts and telecommunications service has successfully performed its mission and role in the important work for building a thriving nation and improving the people's living standard.
					
					 The report was followed by speeches.

articles.title: Birthday Party Given for Participants in National Meeting of Personnel in Posts and Telecommunications
articles.content:
Birthday Party Given for Participants in National Meeting of Personnel in Posts and Telecommunications
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- A party took place at Chongryu Restaurant Monday to congratulate participants in the national meeting of personnel in the field of posts and telecommunications on their birthdays.
					 Present there were Kwak Pom Gi, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Sung Hun, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Sim Chol Ho, minister of Posts and Telecommunications, officials concerned and the participants whose birthdays fall in the period of the meeting.
					
					 Kwak Pom Gi in his address said supreme leader Kim Jong Un took such warm care of making sure that birthday spreads were provided to those who celebrate their birthdays during the meeting.
					
					 He called on all the participants to bear this privilege deep in their minds and devote themselves to carrying out the tasks set forth in the letter sent by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets New German Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets New German Ambassador to DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Thomas Schaefer, new German ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifter Sets New World Record
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifter Sets New World Record 
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK players are emerging victors in the 2013 Asian Cup and Interclub Junior and Senior Weightlifting Championship.
					 Ryugyong Jong Ju Yong Gymnasium was packed with Pyongyangites who came to see games of strong Asians on Sunday.
					
					 Om Yun Chol set a new world record in 169 kg jerk event at the Asian interclub senior weightlifting championship through the combination of quick snatch and jerk. He set an Olympic record in the 56 kg category at the 30th Olympic Games last year and won a gold medal.
					
					 He took the first place in the total standing by succeeding 120 kg in snatch.
					
					 Ryang Chun Hwa and Jong Chun Mi also emerged winners in total points in senior women's 48 kg and 58 kg categories.
					
					 Sin Chol Bom and Kim Chun Mi bagged gold medals in senior men's 56 kg category and women's 58 kg category (in snatch and jerk events respectively).
					
					 Cha Kum Chol who won a title in the World Weightlifting Championship showed his power as a strongman. He took the first place in snatch and jerk events by demonstrating tremendous strength in senior men's 62 kg category to win admiration of the spectators.
					
					 Ri Jong Hwa and Ryo Un Hui came first in total standings in the 63 kg and 69 kg categories in senior women's weightlifting events.
					
					 Jo Pok Hyang also emerged a winner in senior women's 69 kg category (in snatch and jerk events respectively).
					
					 The games go on.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifter Breaks World Record
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifter Breaks World Record 
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- DRPK weightlifter Om Yun Chol set a new world record in the fourth-day competitions at the 2013 Asian Cup and Interclub Junior and Senior Weightlifting Championship going on here.
					 On Sunday, he lifted 120 kg in snatch, 169 kg in clean-and-jerk in the 56 kg category, winning three gold medals with a total of 289 kg.
					
					 He broke the world record of 168 kg in jerk, set by a Turkish weightlifter in 2001.
					
					 He had already set an Olympic record by lifting 168 kg in jerk at the 30th Olympic Games.

articles.title: Greetings to Mexican President
articles.content:
Greetings to Mexican President 
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greeting to Enrique Pena Nieto, president of Mexico, on its 203rd independence day.
					 Expressing belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily grow strong as required by the new century, Kim wished Mexico prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Mexican FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Mexican FM
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Monday sent a message of greeting to his Mexican counterpart Jose Antonio Meade Curibrena on the 203rd independence day of Mexico. 
					 Pak extended warm felicitations to him on the auspicious holiday of the Mexican people and wished him success in his work and Mexico development and prosperity.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The participants in the national meeting of personnel in the field of posts and telecommunications visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them in profound reverence.

articles.title: Thai Foreign Ministry Delegation Here
articles.content:
Thai Foreign Ministry Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Thai Foreign Ministry led by Damrong Kraikruan, director-general of the Department of East Asian Affairs, arrived here by air on Monday.

articles.title: Malaysian National Day Marked Here
articles.content:
Malaysian National Day Marked Here
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Ilham Tuah Bin Illias, Malaysian Charge d'Affaires ad interim to the DPRK, Monday hosted a reception on the occasion of the national day of his country.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade who is chairman of the DPRK-Malaysia Friendship Association, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Mun Jae Chol, vice-director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of the international organizations here.
					
					 Staff members of the Malaysian embassy also attended.

articles.title: Delegation of Red Cross Society of China Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Red Cross Society of China Arrives
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Red Cross Society of China headed by its Executive Vice-President Zhao Baige arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: National Martial Art Championship Goes On in Pyongyang
articles.content:
National Martial Art Championship Goes On in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The 8th National Martial Art Championship for September 10 Prize is going on before full houses here from September 12.
					 The championship, involving Taekwon-Do, Paduk (Go), Wushu and other events, brought together hundreds of men and women players from Pyongyang and provinces of the country.
					
					 On September 13 there were men and women's sparring matches of Taekwon-Do, divided into Group A and B, and Wushu matches. Whenever Taekwon-Do players performed movements of high technique, the spectators gave enthusiastic cheers to them.
					
					 Meanwhile, Paduk competitions are made at the Taekwon-Do Holy Center, with the attendance of more than 120 players of different ages.
					
					 The ongoing championship, which is held every year to mark September 10 when President Kim Il Sung gave field guidance to the Taekwon-Do Hall in Juche 81 (1992), is helpful to promoting the development of the nation's martial art.
					
					 The competitions will run until Wednesday.

articles.title: Results of Sunday Matches of National Martial Art Championship
articles.content:
Results of Sunday Matches of National Martial Art Championship
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The 8th National Martial Art Championship for September 10 Prize continued on Sept. 15.
					 That day there took place sparring matches of Taekwon-Do of men's and women's teams (Group A) and go matches of teams belonging to Groups A and B.
					
					 In the men's team sparring matches (Group A) the national Taekwon-Do Team took the first place, the team of North Hwanghae Province the second place and the teams of Jagang Province and Pyongyang City the third place.
					
					 In the women's team sparring matches, the national Taekwon-Do team came first, the team of South Hamgyong Province second and the teams of Kangwon Province and North Hwanghae Province third.
					
					 In the men's team go matches (Group A), the team of South Hamgyong Province came first and the team of Pyongyang City second and in the women's team go matches the team of Pyongyang City took the first place and the team of South Hamgyong Province the second place.
					
					 In the men's and women's matches in Group B, the teams of North Hamgyong Province and South Hamgyong Province came first, the teams of Kangwon Province and Pyongyang City second and the teams of South Phyongan Province, North Hwanghae Province, Kangwon Province and the Pyongyang Paduk Centre third.
					
					 The competitions continue.

articles.title: DPRK Remains Firm in Its Will for Peace: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK Remains Firm in Its Will for Peace: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Fruits are being yielded with much effort in the inter-Korean relations. 
					 The north and the south at the recent second round of the meeting of the north-south joint committee for the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) agreed to restart the operation in the zone after making trial operation at the enterprises in the zone from September 16. Meanwhile, diverse undertakings including the reunion of separated families and relatives are being pushed ahead. 
					
					 This gives hope and expectation to all Koreans and progressive mankind desirous of an end to the national division and of durable peace on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The DPRK remains invariable in its will for peace and dialogue, maintaining utmost vigilance and exercising maximum self-restraint towards all hostile acts to create tension again on the peninsula. It is winning growing sympathy and support from the international community. 
					
					 As seen above, it is the consistent and steadfast stand of the DPRK to achieve peace on the peninsula and the peaceful reunification of Korea. 
					
					 The Koreans, a homogeneous nation, have been forced by outside forces to live separated into the north and the south for more than half a century with differing ideologies and social systems. But, this cannot be a ground for them to stand in confrontation. This is the position of the DPRK. 
					
					 Escalating tension on the peninsula and confrontation between fellow countrymen are acts of treachery going against the desire and wishes of the nation as they lead the nation to ruin and help outside forces fish in troubled waters. 
					
					 The Koreans have firm will to achieve peace and reunification of Korea and practical ways jointly agreed upon between the north and the south. 
					
					 It is the DPRK's consistent principle for national reunification to achieve it through dialogue, negotiations and other peaceful means, not by use of force or war. 
					
					 The DPRK government has made strenuous and patient efforts for national reconciliation, unity and peaceful reunification for a long period since the country's division. 
					
					 The DPRK clarified principled stands for creating favorable environment for durable peace and peaceful reunification including the issue of replacing the ceasefire mechanism by a peace mechanism and advanced many realistic proposals for putting them into practice. 
					
					 Each time the DPRK clarified its stand and proposal, it received full support and welcome from all Koreans as they were aimed to achieve the peaceful reunification of the country through national reconciliation and unity. 
					
					 Its will for peaceful reunification is clearly proved by the July 4 Joint Statement agreed upon between the north and the south 41 years ago which regards independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity as main principles for national reunification. 
					
					 The cause of national reunification would have made big progress had the agreed points of the July 4 Joint Statement which consists of seven provisions been sincerely implemented. They include the issues of stopping slandering the other side and taking positive measures to prevent sudden military conflicts and enforcing multifarious exchanges between the north and the south on the basis of the three principles of national reunification. 
					
					 Thanks to the DPRK's positive efforts, the historic north-south summit, the first of its kind in the history of national division, took place before the beginning of the new century and the June 15 joint declaration the core of which is the idea of "by our nation itself" was adopted. This marked an event to be specially recorded in the nation's history of the movement for peaceful reunification. 
					
					 The adoption of the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, paved a new wide avenue for the development of the north-south relations and peace and prosperity. 
					
					 The adoption of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration laid a firm foundation for realizing the desire of the Koreans for peace and peaceful reunification of the peninsula. 
					
					It is a clear way of achieving peace, reunification and prosperity of the nation at present to respect and implement the declarations agreed upon between the top leaders of the north and the south.
					
					 Invariable is the will of the DPRK to defend peace on the peninsula and achieve the independent reunification of the country through reconciliation and unity of the north and the south in a peaceful environment. 
					
					 Facts will go to prove this.

articles.title: Promising Wrestler
articles.content:
Promising Wrestler
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The 11th Grand Bull Prize National Ssirum (Korean-wrestling) Contest took place here some days ago.
					 Among its competitors was Yu Song Su, a worker of Chongjin Stadium, who showed high techniques in catch-weight event to be applauded by the spectators.
					
					 He, 21, was the youngest of the competitors, but skillfully made competitions with his experienced rivals to advance into the semifinals, drawing attention of experts and fans.
					
					 Taking the third place in the contest, Yu expressed his will to win the bull at the next contest.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about IS's Interference in Election Demanded by Catholics in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about IS's Interference in Election Demanded by Catholics in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The Kwangju Archdiocese of the Catholic Church in south Korea held a mass on the situation in Seoul on Thursday demanding probe into the interference of the Intelligence Service (IS) in the election.
					 Criticizing the IS's interference in the election, speakers there urged the present chief executive to clarify her will to punish the IS, police and "the Saenuri Party". 
					
					 They called for struggling to the last in unity till the IS is reformed and democracy is achieved.
					
					 They declared that they would hold mass on the situation every Thursday from next month in demand of probe into the truth about the case and punishment of its culprits. 
					
					 Then they made public a statement in demand of special investigation into the IS's illegal interference in the election and the act of opening to public the minutes of the south-north summit, the present chief executive's apology, the  reform of the IS, stop to unfair reporting by the conservative media, etc. 
					
					 The participants staged a demonstration demanding the disbandment of the IS.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about Interference in Election Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about Interference in Election Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Believers of south Korea held a prayer meeting on the situation in Seoul on Sept. 11 demanding the "government" authorities probe the truth behind the interference in the election and punish those responsible for it.
					 They held that the Intelligence Service's interference in the election was a serious case of reviving the past era of dictatorship.
					
					 The IS is a stumbling block lying in the way of achieving democracy, they noted, calling for dismantling it instead of reforming it.
					
					 The present chief executive should step down instead of making apology because the election which allowed the IS's interference is invalid, they held, adding:
					
					 Those who instigated the IS's interference in the election and sought their interests have resorted to all sorts of dastardly acts such as opening to public the minutes of the south-north summit.
					
					 They declared that the believers would probe the truth about the IS's interference in the election and carry on their actions for the punishment of those involved in the case and against those who are working hard to cover it up.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Celebrate Anniversary of DPRK
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Celebrate Anniversary of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Japan significantly celebrated the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 An Osaka Prefectural meeting of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 65th anniversary of the DPRK took place in Osaka City, Japan on Sept. 10.
					
					 Present there were Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the Osaka Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), other officials and compatriots.
					
					 Read out at the meeting was a congratulatory message supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent to all officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 Pu Yong Uk said in his report that the Koreans in Japan have carried forward the tradition of the predecessors who have glorified their worthwhile life on the road of patriotism, looking up to the DPRK as their motherland and beacon of hope.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.
					
					 An art performance "Prospering Motherland, Happiness of Compatriots" was given.
					
					 A meeting of the Sumida Chapter of Chongryon for celebrating the 65th anniversary of the DPRK was held in Sumida Ward, Tokyo Metropolis, on Sept. 8 and an art performance was given by the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe.
					
					 A celebration meeting and reception were held by the Zuhoku Chapter of Chongryon in Kanagawa Prefecture on the same day.
					
					 The speakers there called for intensifying the work of the chapters and branches by concerted efforts to significantly greet the 23rd congress of Chongryon to be held this year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was published in booklet by Dhaka City Vector Publishing House in Bangladesh.
					 The work, made public on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in the cause of national reunification.
					
					 It formulates the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification. It also indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to achieve the cause of national reunification on the basis of the three charters and ways to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in pamphlet by the Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House in Russia on September 6.
					 The speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade marking the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that the 100-year-long history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proved the immutable truth that the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation are guaranteed by the outstanding leader.
					
					 It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to exalt the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Observed in Peru
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Observed in Peru
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Lima, Peru on Sept. 6 to celebrate the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Speeches were made by Cati Campos, general secretary of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, Estuardo Martinez Perez, president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the chairman of the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute, the curator of the Kim Jong Suk Library of Peru, Yuri Cesar Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and others.
					
					 The speakers praised Generalissimo Kim Il Sung as great leader who liberated Korea from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists, founded the DPRK guided by the Juche idea and established the advanced socialist system centered on the masses.
					
					 The DPRK turned into a political, ideological and military power as Generalissimo Kim Jong Il developed the Juche-oriented idea of nation-building and successfully guided the DPRK with the Songun politics, they said, and went on.
					
					 The DPRK will make a long drive in the future, too, as supreme leader Kim Jong Un is leading the DPRK, true to the cause of the great Generalissimos.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Observed in DR Congo
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Observed in DR Congo
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting of political parties and organizations of DR Congo took place in Kinshasa on September 5 to mark the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed in the venue of the meeting were photos showing immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il performed in the nation-building and photos documenting revolutionary activities of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present there were figures of political parties and organizations of DR Congo including the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy, Communist Party, National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association and other people.
					
					 Gaspar Kabongo, deputy secretary of the National Executive Committee of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy, said that the DPRK, which was founded by Kim Il Sung and turned into an invincible power by Kim Jong Il, has entered a new stage of development under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 All Korean people, single-mindedly united, disciplined and organized, follow their leader with deep respect.
					
					 The military parade and mass demonstration, in particular, powerfully demonstrated the national power bolstered up over the last 65 years since its founding and once again clearly proved that no one can match the might of the DPRK.
					
					 The epoch-making changes that have taken place in the DPRK would be unthinkable without the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and they are a brilliant fruition of the Juche idea centered on the masses.
					
					 The deputy secretary expressed conviction that the DPRK would prosper thanks to the outstanding leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and extended warm felicitations to the Korean people marking the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted in the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Meetings, seminars, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Bangladesh, Ecuador, Switzerland, Uganda, and Tunisia from Sept. 6 to 9 in celebration of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos of President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were famous works of the peerlessly great men and photos and books on successes achieved by the Korean people in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The participants in the film shows watched "The Tower of the Juche Idea", "Pyongyang at Night" and other Korean films.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Party of Bangladesh and other speakers highly praised Kim Il Sung as the founder of socialist Korea and invincible iron-willed commander who defeated two imperialisms in one generation.
					
					 Stressing that the undying feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed for socialist Korea and progressive mankind would go down in history, they expressed the conviction that the Korean people would accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation without fail under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea noted that the founding of the DPRK marked a great event to be specially recorded in the human history.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the DPRK turned into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defense, recognized by the world, he said, adding:
					
					 We extend invariable support and solidarity to the people of the DPRK in their effort to build a thriving socialist nation and reunify the country, closely rallied around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Messages of greeting to him were adopted at the meetings held in Switzerland and Tunisia.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked by Social Body of Czech Republic
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked by Social Body of Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association published a special issue of its bulletin on Sept. 9 on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Its article titled "Socialist Korea" said that Generalissimo Kim Il Sung led the 15-year-long anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory to liberate the country and found the DPRK, the first people's democratic state in the East.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 The Korean people inflicted a heavy defeat on the U.S. in the Korean War, the first of its kind in its history, defending the DPRK's sovereignty and dignity, and built it into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defense, by dynamically carrying out the socialist construction of various phases.
					
					 The socialist system centered on the popular masses was established in the DPRK and it was strengthened under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK defended socialism even in the worst adversity at around the end of the last century, emerging a politico-ideological and military power, and is now striving to become an economic power.
					
					 Another article titled "Songun Politics of Korea" noted that Kim Jong Il began his Songun revolutionary leadership by inspecting Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on Aug. 25, 1960, and formulated the Songun politics as a main political mode under socialism. It explained the validity and vitality of the politics.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Sports enthusiasm in the DPRK" noted that sports enthusiasm is mounting in the country and astonishing successes are being made in international tournaments, adding that the DPRK is dynamically advancing towards a sports power under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia juegos del campeonato de levantamiento de pesas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia juegos del campeonato de levantamiento de pesas
Pyongyang, 16 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, con Ri Sol Ju, presencio el dia 15 los juegos de las divisiones de 63kg y 69kg de la categoria de adultas del campeonato de levantamiento de pesas por la copa asiatica y de clubes de los jovenes y adultos de 2013.
					En el encuentro con el Mariscal, el vicepresidente de la Federacion Internacional de Levantamiento de Pesas y primer vicepresidente de la Federacion Asiatica de Levantamiento de Pesas, el secretario general y el vicepresidente de esa ultima federacion le agradecieron por haber tomado medidas necesarias a la exitosa marcha del campeonato.
					
					Dijeron que la presencia del Mariscal en la sede de juegos constituye gran apoyo y estimulo para la Federacion Asiatica de Levantamiento de Pesas y significa para ellos un gran honor y felicidad.
					
					El Mariscal dijo estar muy complacido de que los jugadores de varios paises compitieran en esta cita deportiva de Pyongyang justamente cuando en la RPDC se levanta la ola deportiva y crece cada dia mas la atencion social al deporte. Y evaluo los ingentes esfuerzos que realizaron por la exitosa apertura del presente evento la Federacion Asiatica de Levantamiento de Pesas, la Federacion Internacional de Levantamiento de Pesas y otras organizaciones correspondientes.
					
					En los juegos de ese dia, las coreanas Ri Jong Hwa, Ryo Un Hui y Jo Pok Hyang conquistaron las medallas de oro usando sus tecnicas adiestradas en los entrenamientos rutinarios.
					
					La china Long Dingling tambien conquisto una medalla de oro aplicando su habilidad especial.
					
					El Mariscal envio aplausos para felicitar a las pesistas que demostraron excelentes juegos.
					
					Manifesto la conviccion de que el presente campeonato, en que participan los jugadores sobresalientes de ambos sexos provenientes de mas de 10 paises y regiones, marcara un hito importante para intensificar el intercambio y cooperacion entre los deportistas y desarrollar las tecnicas de esa disciplina.
					
					Estuvieron tambien entre los espectadores Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Ri Yong Su y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito junto con los capitalinos de diversos sectores.

articles.title: Tiene lugar conferencia nacional de funcionarios de comunicaciones
articles.content:
Tiene lugar conferencia nacional de funcionarios de comunicaciones 
Pyongyang, 16 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este lunes en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la conferencia nacional de funcionarios de la rama de comunicaciones. 
					Asistieron al conclave Pak Pong Ju, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Ki Nam y otros cuadros, los secretarios responsables de los comites provinciales del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios, organos centrales y las instituciones provinciales, urbanas y distritales del partido y el Poder, los funcionarios y trabajadores ejemplares de la rama y los funcionarios de los dominios relacionados. 
					
					El miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y primer ministro de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, transmitio el historico mensaje del Mariscal Kim Jong Un "Para registrar nuevo viraje en las comunicaciones", enviado a los participantes en la conferencia. 
					
					En el mensaje, el Mariscal recordo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presentaron la autoctona idea y teoria en materia de las comunicaciones, iluminaron el rumbo y remedios para modernizarlas de acuerdo con las demandas de la revolucion en desarrollo e hicieron grandes esfuerzos por el respecto. 
					
					Y dilucido claramente las tareas y remedios para defender y glorificar las imperecederas proezas de los Generalisimos por el desarrollo autoctono de la rama y elevar al avanzado nivel mundial en un corto plazo las comunicaciones del pais mediante la campana para materializar a riesgo de la vida la politica del PTC sobre la rama. 
					
					Llamo a los funcionarios de la rama a cumplir con su honrosa mision y deber con el espiritu de servicio abnegado a la patria y el pueblo y registrar un nuevo viraje en las labores de comunicaciones. 
					
					El vicepremier Jon Sung Hun presento el informe. 
					
					El orador se refirio a que las comunicaciones del pais lograron orgulloso desarrollo gracias a los esfuerzos patrioticos y abnegados y la energica orientacion del Presidente y del Dirigente. 
					
					Apunto que la autoctona idea de los Generalisimos sobre la rama y sus imperecederas proezas de direccion se llevan adelante por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Destaco que las comunicaciones del pais han cumplido satisfactoriamente su mision y papel en la construccion de patria prospera y en el mejoramiento de las condiciones de la vida del pueblo. 
					
					Acto seguido, hubo intervenciones.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok se reune con nuevo embajador aleman en Corea
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok se reune con nuevo embajador aleman en Corea
Pyongyang, 16 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Thae Bok departio el dia 16 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el nuevo embajador de la Republica Federal de Alemania en Corea, Thomas Schaefer quien realizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Om Yun Chol de RPDC rompe record mundial de hace 12 anos
articles.content:
Om Yun Chol de RPDC rompe record mundial de hace 12 anos
Pyongyang, 16 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Om Yun Chol, pesista de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea registro un nuevo record del mundo en el juego de la cuarta jornada del campeonato de levantamiento de pesas por la copa asiatica y de clubes de los jovenes y adultos de 2013.
					  Om quien participo el dia 15 en el juego de la division de 56kg levanto en total 289kg con 120kg en arranque y 169kg en envion y obtuvo 3 medallas de oro.
					
					  Especialmente rompio el record de mundo establecido por un jugador de Turquia en 2001 con 168 kg en envion.
					
					  Numerosos espectadores dieron aplausos calurosos a Om Yun Chol que logro exito excelente superando la imaginacion de los especialistas y aficionados.
					
					  Om ya habia implantado el nuevo record  olimpico al levantar 168kg en envion, 3 veces mas que su peso corporal en los XXX Juegos Olimpicos.
